alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:13AM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Morristown TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Virginia... Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Russell, Wise and Scott Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River at Cleveland VA. * WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding affects the pumping station for the water treatment plant. At 16.0 feet, Approximately 10 acres are flooded, including the ballpark. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 10.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EST.
